package logikapemrog;
import java.util.*;
public class latihanmath {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
Scanner scan = new Scanner (System.in);
	double nilai1,nilai2,nilai3; 
	System.out.println("Masukan Nilai: "); nilai1= scan.nextDouble();
	System.out.println("Akar dari " +nilai1+"adalah" +Math.sqrt(nilai1));
	System.out.println("Masukan Nilai: "); nilai2= scan.nextDouble();
	System.out.println("Masukan Nilai: "); nilai3= scan.nextDouble();
	System.out.println("pangkat " +nilai2+ "dari " +nilai3+"adalah" +Math.pow(nilai2,nilai3));
	
	}

}
